spec1.title: CALIBUS
spec1.description: The CALIBUS is our Laser-Induced Breakdown Spectrometer (LIBS). It is the first Complementary Metal-Oxide Semiconductor (CMOS)-based LIBS analyzer on the market capable of measuring carbon in ferrous materials. The new CALIBUS is an ideal analytical solution for Quality Assurance/Quality Control (QA/QC), metallurgical manufacturing and machining, petrochemical industries, and the scrap and recycling sector.

spec2.title: MERLIN 4
spec2.description: The MERLIN 4 is a midrange Complementary Metal-Oxide Semiconductor (CMOS)-based spectrometer, available as both a dedicated single-base unit and a versatile multi-base system. It is perfectly suited for the metal production and inspection industries, contract analysis laboratories, and the marine industry, also being ideal for metal processing.

spec3.title: ARTUS 8 (OES)
spec3.description: The ARTUS 8 meets the requirement of providing fast, precise, and accurate analysis for a perfect melt. It is one of the most powerful and reliable spectrometers, offering a complete range of analytical programs, including cast irons, carbon and nitrogen in steels, and all alloying elements and their traces needed for treatment. It offers all the advantages of a flexible and versatile Complementary Metal-Oxide Semiconductor (CMOS) spectrometer. It even competes in certain applications with classic Photo Multiplier Tube systems, which are still the benchmark in high-end Optical Emission Spectrometry (OES).

spec4.title: ARTUS 10 (OES)
spec4.description: The ARTUS 10 includes a scientific-grade CMOS sensor that reduces analysis time for some metals to as little as 10 seconds. Furthermore, its smart algorithms eliminate background interference, allowing for optimal analytical performance. Among the features of the ARTUS are also included: a dual optical system; a flowing gas channel design; a cast aluminum encapsulated light chamber; tool-less access to the UV and visible optical lenses; and a latch-type electrode locking device.
